name: Ageless Machine: Cup of Tea
description:
A man unwittingly drinks a tea that leaves him at mercy of The Puppeteer, then meets The Redeemer who may have experienced the same fate.

The history starts to repeat itself in a disastrous way when the main character is asked to murder someone.

This game was made during Ludum Dare 32 in under 48 hours.

If you got stuck and need a solution to some puzzle, watch this walkthrough. For story explanation visit this page.

If you like the game, consider tweeting some nice stuff to me on Twitter or just name your own price.
